item.description: The @rmathematicus is back to blogging. Taking apart another #histSTM cliché: "you never heard of" https://t.co/l16n5MLxFs #mbpicks

item.title: @pkrautz's pick
item.description: Good piece on the particular toxicity of the mathematical community. Warning: don't read the comments. #mbpicks https://t.co/PjiKykLELK
